attributes.action: Allow tenants to buy properties from company's
attributes.additional_details: To help out people who are struggling with everyday living and also those who are willing to buy a house. Due to this pandemic it has become hard to manage and save money for living costs and buying a house seems like a far goal at the moment. If the government allows us to buy our current house we won't have to pay a deposit and will make life easier for many and fulfill the wishes of owning a house.
attributes.background: Give rights for tenants to buy company built houses

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, if you want all private tenants to have the right to buy their home from their landlord.
